title: Example Feature Walkthrough
description: Build a complete example feature through all 7 implementation phases to prove the workflow works end-to-end. Each phase is a separate commit so users can see exactly what each phase produces. This is the 'proof it works' that builds trust.

context_chain.receives_summary: Working monorepo scaffold to build the example feature into
context_chain.output_summary: Complete example feature with 7 commits showing the workflow in action

example_feature.name: Todo List
example_feature.description: A simple but complete CRUD todo list. Chosen because it's universally understood — every developer knows what a todo app does, so the focus stays on the WORKFLOW, not the domain logic.
example_feature.story: As a user, I want to create, view, complete, and delete todos so I can track my tasks

deliverables.description: PRD for the todo list feature, generated by /prd
User story with BDD scenarios, generated by /story
Document showing each phase's commit: what files were created, what tests were written, the commit message used

implementation_phases.title: Presentational UI
implementation_phases.commit_message: feat(web): add todo list UI components

implementation_phases.title: API Client + Mocks
implementation_phases.commit_message: feat(web): add todo API client with MSW mocks

implementation_phases.title: Smart Components
implementation_phases.commit_message: feat(web): connect todo UI to state management

implementation_phases.title: Repository Layer
implementation_phases.commit_message: feat(api): add todo repository with Testcontainers tests

implementation_phases.title: Service Layer
implementation_phases.commit_message: feat(api): add todo service with unit tests

implementation_phases.title: Controllers
implementation_phases.commit_message: feat(api): add todo endpoints with E2E tests

implementation_phases.title: Integration
implementation_phases.commit_message: feat: integrate todo app with real API

tasks.title: Generate example PRD, story, and plan
tasks.description: Use /prd, /story, and /phased-plan to generate the example docs for the todo list feature. Save to docs/examples/.

tasks.title: Implement Phases 1-3 (Frontend)
tasks.description: Build the todo list frontend through Phases 1, 2, and 3. Commit after each phase with the specified commit messages.

tasks.title: Implement Phases 4-6 (Backend TDD)
tasks.description: Build the todo API through Phases 4, 5, and 6 using inside-out TDD. Commit after each phase.

tasks.title: Implement Phase 7 (Integration)
tasks.description: Connect frontend to real backend. Verify the full flow works end-to-end.

tasks.title: Document the phase commits
tasks.description: Create docs/examples/phase-commits.md showing what each commit produced — files, tests, commit message.

acceptance_criteria: All 7 phases produce working code with passing tests
Each phase is a separate, clean commit
Example docs (PRD, story, plan) exist in docs/examples/
Phase commits document exists showing the full journey
Todo app works end-to-end: create, view, complete, delete
